excerpt: This vegan pizza is a delicious alternative to traditional meat-based pizzas, with spicy buffalo cauliflower and creamy vegan cheese.

instructions.name: Make the Cauliflower Crust
instructions: Place the riced cauliflower in a large bowl and microwave on high for 5 minutes.
Stir in the flaxseed, almond flour, garlic powder, and salt until a dough forms.
Place the dough on a parchment-lined baking sheet and press into a circle. Bake for 20 minutes or until lightly browned.

instructions.name: Make the Buffalo Cauliflower Topping
instructions: In a small saucepan, melt the vegan butter over low heat.
Stir in the hot sauce, garlic powder, onion powder, and salt.
In a large bowl, toss the cauliflower with the sauce until evenly coated.
Place the cauliflower on a parchment-lined baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes or until tender and slightly browned.

instructions.name: Assemble the Pizza
instructions: Spread the shredded vegan mozzarella cheese over the cauliflower crust.
Top with the buffalo cauliflower and sliced green onions.
Bake for 5-7 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve hot.
